sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import "./pages.css"; import {Col} from "react-bootstrap"; import BookMeBanner from "../images/Banner/BookMe2.jpg" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" var satu = "https://www.satulankinen.fi/"; var canario_passarinho = "https://www.recantocaipira.com.br/duplas/canario_passarinho/canario_passarinho.html"; var dream = "https://medium.com/@pedro.bergamo/my-dream-as-a-composer-96f8b9903ba0"; var flotation = "http://flotation-simulator.com"; const Santeros = () => { return(

"Soulfull, mystical and danceable. It is like a cool gypsy band. A hidden gem in Helsinki that everyone should know about!" - Elina

It all started with a dream. After that, a 15 year old Pedro Bergamo was composing gospel music for his worship group, while studying to become a pastor. It didn't work out in the end. Pedro left the church and became deeply involved in mysticism, just like a pendul that moves to the oposite extreme as soon as it is released. He also joined a hard rock band and played a couple times, but his trouble with addiction led him to return to his hometown and start a new life. His father wanted him to become a Sertanejo musician, perhaps because that was the only profession he

knew

. He even bought him a viola caipira. But that was not what he was looking for, even though he continued composing his music, but now experimenting with the Portuguese language. One day, he saw a book in his friend's house. It was a book about magic and Pedro asked if he could borrow. Instead of the magic of Aleister Crowley or the magic of Eliphas Levi, in each by this time he was quite acquinted, it was a book of magic tricks. One of the magic tricks, however sparked his interest in Chemistry. So when he was 22, he started studying, getting a master in 2017 and moving to Finland in the same year to pursue a Ph.D. using games to teach the chemistry related to flotation.

It was 2019, he lost his step-grandfather and in 2020, two close friends who studied chemistry with him. His therapist said he was working too hard and he needed to enjoy life a bit more. Perhaps find a new hobbie. In the summer of 2020 he joined a Finnish latin band called 'La Orquesta del fin del mundo'. There he met Satu, Seppo and Rolando and started praticing his original songs for the first time with a band, together with some covers. After two gigs, the drummer Rolando Camilo suggested that Pedro should have their own band where the only focus would be on his original compositions. They invited Satu in the accordion and named the band "Los Santeros". Seppo Salmi joining the band in the guitar, they renamed the band to Pedro Bergamo & Los Santeros, since an american band already had the same name.After trying out with some bassists, Pedro's girlfriend suggested a friend from her music school who also composed Brazilian jazz music.

Pedro Bergamo & Los Santeros is a rock band based in Helsinki - Finland. He has a vast repertoire of Brazilian, latin and rock music, besides his original tunes. No matter the size of your event, you can hire Los Santeros to bring your party to a whole new level.

Contact for gigs:

phone: (+358)406740101

email: pedrobergamo89@gmail.com

Los Santeros is composed by

Pedro Bergamo - Acoustic Guitar & Vocals

Satu Lankinen - Accordion & Vocals

Seppo Salmi - Electric Guitar

Max Loponen - Bass

Rolando Camilo - Drums

); }; export default Santeros;
